name: Parslied Potato Salad
keywords: fennel, parsley, potato, gluten-free, side dish
recipeIngredient: 10 pounds new potatoes, peeled and quartered
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
12-ounce can anchovy fillets, plus their packing oil

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potatoes in salted boiling water until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain. Put onions, fennel, parsley and zest in a large serving bowl. Place all dressing ingredients, except the Italian parsley, in a blender and emulsify, about 30 seconds. Add the Italian parsley incrementally and process until liquefied and bright green. When the potatoes are cool, add them to the other vegetables. Pour on the dressing and blend well. (Salad and dressing can be made a day ahead.)
